name: What Is Halloween?
description:
Synopsis: You learn about what Halloween is. With your new knowledge, you decide to partake and have fun with this seemingly new(?) exciting holiday. 

This game was made for Ludum Dare 45, a game jam where developers make a game over a weekend around a unique theme.

Sadly, this project wasn’t finished on time, but I managed to make it playable before the deadline. It’s unfortunate really, since it’s my first incomplete Ludum Dare project.

Programmer: Lexyvil

Artist: Nene

Voice: Capris
